column5: I noticed that too...lots of melting on Simcoe and the northern sections of the Trent Waterway.
WOW, thats awesome! Nature is amazing eh.  Hopefully the rain will come next week though...if not, gonna be tough Troutin'
Bill...not google earth...these are sattelite shots from a website....  http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/modis/mod...on=o&page=1

The ice it be going away fast here in the bay aswell. I noticed the Tiffen launch was ice free this afternoon,just incase the Tin Banger wanted to smell some outboard fumes.LOL  Just beware of dead heads out there folks.
Please keep the rain away...LOL.  I got enough flooding so far this spring in my crawl space.  Sorry Trout guys but I am wishing the rain away this spring....LOL
Awesome site.  However, I notice 'lakes' where there are supposed to be farms!  Might be an interesting drive when I get up near the cottage tonight.
Love this site, way cool. Confirms what i thought. Perch fishn in Simcoe side of Orillia....will be a bust. This south wind all week has moved the ice that way.
